name: O.U.R.S: Operation: Unbreakable Relic Sword
description:
O.U.R.S: Operation: Unbreakable Relic Sword

The entire world is doomed. The world is no longer belongs to us. Last hope is Project O.U.R.S. It’s a power gives the user to control “Unbreakable Relic Sword”. To cross, the aliens.

Are you ready to save the world?

●High-speed action run through horde of robot aliens!
●Use mouse to freely control your weapon against the enemies
●Explosion, destruction! Slash everything in front of you!
●Supports: PC, Windows
●Made by Unity Engine

Special Thanks

  1.  Silpakorn University Faculty of Music
  2. “Hard Wall” Music by MATSU 
  3.  “Raijin” Music by Anonyment 
  4.  “Mastermind Scholar” Music by POLARIS PLUS
